mode.label: Mode
mode.comment: Please note that, after changing this value, you might also need to update additional fields like API Key.
mode.tooltip: Depending on the selection the extension will communicate with the FreePay test / sandbox / production service. Choose custom, if you have to use special urls for the gateway.

freepay_order_status.label: Order status: order creation
freepay_order_status.tooltip: Status given to newly created orders before payment result confirmation via server notifications from FreePay.

freepay_payment_cancelled.label: Order status: order cancellation
freepay_payment_cancelled.tooltip: Transition status assigned to orders after cancellation and waiting for FreePay notification (CANCEL_OR_REFUND). If orders are already invoiced, they cannot be cancelled, but will be refunded instead.

freepay_refund_authorized.label: Order status: full refunded
freepay_refund_authorized.tooltip: Status given to order after a refund has been made on the order. This is triggered when the REFUND notification is received.

freepay_refund_partial_authorized.label: Order status: partial refunded
freepay_refund_partial_authorized.tooltip: Status given to order after a partial refund has been made on the order. This is triggered when the REFUND notification is received. We advise to don't set this status and let Magento decide the status.
